CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PEBDTPD devices yielded a higher PCE of 5.3% with a V oc of 0.72 V , a J sc of 13.5 mA / cm^2 , and a FF of 0.54.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEBDTPD |

The material name in the paragraph is "PEBDTPD". It appears twice in the paragraph, once in the phrase "PEBDTPD devices" and again in the phrase "PEBDTPD devices yielded a higher PCE".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEBDTPD |

The only material name mentioned in the paragraph is "PEBDTPD". The other entities mentioned, such as "V oc", "J sc", and "FF", do not refer to material names, but rather to properties or characteristics of the devices made from the material. Therefore, the table above only includes "PEBDTPD" as the valid material name entity.
